statements: SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM Sales WHERE sales_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id FROM Sales WHERE sales_amount < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM Sales;
SELECT order_id, product_id, sales_amount, order_date FROM Sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Sales WHERE sales_amount < 500 AND order_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT order_id, sales_amount, DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM Sales WHERE order_date LIKE '2022%' ORDER BY formatted_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, id FROM sales ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM marketing WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks > 500;
SELECT * FROM marketing ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM marketing WHERE impressions > 500 AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM marketing WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM Marketing WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Marketing ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Financial WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM Financial ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date, campaign_id FROM Marketing WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_start_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM Financial WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount, product_id FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500.00 AND 1000.00 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM Marketing WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, total_amount FROM sales ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM marketing WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial WHERE transaction_type = 'expense';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_amount ASC
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM sales WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM marketing WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM financial WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' AND amount > 5000
SELECT report_type, report_date, performance_score FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT revenue, quantity FROM sales_kpi
SELECT date, revenue, quantity FROM sales_kpi WHERE revenue > 10000
SELECT * FROM marketing_kpi ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT team_name, region FROM sales_team WHERE region='West'
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM marketing_team
SELECT * FROM sales_kpi WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM sales_team ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT date, profit FROM financial_kpi WHERE expenses < profit
SELECT region, leads, conversions FROM marketing_team WHERE region = 'North'
SELECT team_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_team JOIN sales_kpi ON sales_team.team_id = sales_kpi.sales_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
